doc:
Ralph Bates https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Bates 0 Ralph Bates (12 February 1940 – 27 March 1991) was an English film and television actor, known for his role in the British sitcom Dear John and for being one of Hammer Horror's best-known actors from the latter period of the company. Ralph_Bates ( 12_February_1940 – 27_March_1991 ) was an_English_film_and_television_actor , known for his_role in the_British_sitcom_Dear_John and for being one of Hammer_Horror 's_best-known_actors from the_latter_period of the_company .
